Package hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.algorithm.cegar

Interface ArgAbstractor<S extends State,A extends Action,P extends Prec>

All Superinterfaces:
Abstractor<P,ARG<S,A>>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicArgAbstractor
public interface ArgAbstractor<S extends State,A extends Action,P extends Prec> extends Abstractor<P,ARG<S,A>>
Common interface for the abstractor component. It can create an initial ARG and check an ARG with a given precision.
